code: import initalState from'./initialState';export var reducerMenu=function reducerMenu(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initalState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'OPEN_MENU':return Object.assign({},state,{menu:true});case'CLOSE_MENU':return Object.assign({},state,{menu:false});case'CLOSE_AND_CHEANGE_CATEGORY':return Object.assign({},state,{menu:false,category:action.payload.category});default:return state;}};// , category: action.payload.category
